title: Temple: A Radical Arts Project in Derry-Londonderry
author: Jon Mitchell
content:
Our heroic partners at Artichoke have released a 12-minute documentary about their Temple project in Northern Ireland, in collaboration with David Best, creator of the Temple at Burning Man. Itâ€™s the crowning achievement of an incredibly successful, groundbreaking and moving project.

(Photo credit for home page tile: Josh Lease)
